effect.sun_moon: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.sun_moon: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out.
